actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the establishment of the Oregon Trail National Historic Site in the State of Oregon, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to designate up to ten acres of land in and near the city of Vale, Oregon, for establishment of the Oregon Trail National Historic Site. Authorizes appropriations of such sums as may be necessary to carry out the purposes of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the establishment of the Oregon Trail National Historic Site in the State of Oregon, and for other purposes.
